translation.en: [The Man] Hello? It's happening?
It's happening! Julia, Julia, Julia!
-The baby's coming! -[Julia] But I haven't got Teddy!
translation.it: - La bimba sta per nascere! - Ma non ho preso l'orsacchiotto!

translation.en: [The Man] Huh? Julia, we gotta go.
Hey, I found him. Teddy's in the backseat.
[Julia] Oh, oh. Oh, okay.
[The Man] Let's go, honey. You're about to meet your new little sister.
translation.it: Andiamo. Presto conoscerai la tua sorellina.

translation.en: [Julia] I'm not sure I want to.
Oh, my goodness!
We are running terry-belly, horri-belly late!
Are we gonna miss our big permorfance?
translation.it: Non arriveremo in tempo per la nostra grande performance?

translation.en: Not if we use Jaction! That's Jay plus action!
translation.it: No, basterà sfruttare un po' di Jaction! Jay più "action"!

translation.en: Oh... Help remind me. Why did we enter this talent show?
translation.it: Ricordatemi perché partecipiamo a questo talent show.

translation.en: Because winning could make my... [clears throat] Sorry... our career.
translation.it: Perché vincendo avrò... Scusate, avremo una carriera fantastica.

translation.en: Don't you want to be incredi-belly famous?
translation.it: Voi non volete diventare panciosamente famosi?

translation.en: Let me think. No.
-Uh... Oh! Squishball! Incoming! -[all screaming]
-Psst, you're on. -Huh?
[grunts] It's okay. I got this.
[chuckles nervously] Um, hello!
Uh, here's a new one we've been working on.
Ugh! Hey, just play your old stuff, huh?
Whoa-ho-ho-ho! I give that performance my highest accolade.
translation.it: Darò a questa performance il mio più grande riconoscimento.

translation.en: Whoo-hoo-hoo! That's high, all right.
And now we need all contestants back on stage
translation.it: E ora tutti i partecipanti devono tornare sul palco

translation.en: for the big announcement.
Drum roll, please.
And the winner of the Garden Talent Show is...
translation.it: Il vincitore del Garden Talent Show...

translation.en: [chuckles] the Beat Bugs
for their hilarious musical comedy act!
translation.it: per la loro spassosa commedia musicale!

translation.en: [laughing] We won!
And here's your prize!
An entry ticket to the biggest talent show in the whole insect world,
translation.it: Un biglietto per accedere al più grande talent show del mondo degli insetti:

translation.en: the Bug Factor!
[all gasp] The Bug Factor?
[laughs] Oh, my! We're gonna be celebri-bugs.
[chuckles] Oh, catch me. Oh!
translation.it: Santo cielo. Diventeremo famosi. Sto per svenire.

translation.en: Um... what's the Bug Factor?
[announcer] And here's a sneak peek at this year's Bug Factor contestants,
translation.it: Ed ecco un assaggio dei concorrenti di Bug Factor di quest'anno,

translation.en: including the amazing nine-time Bug Factor winner,
translation.it: tra cui la nove volte vincitrice del programma:

translation.en: I can't belly-lieve we'll be sharing the stage with Queen Bee.
translation.it: Non posso credere che ci esibiremo sullo stesso palco di Queen Bee.

translation.en: And we could win that.
Uh, but there's just one problem.
The Bug Factor is held at the Rocket Ship Park over here,
translation.it: Bug Factor si tiene al Rocket Ship Park quaggiù

translation.en: and we are out in the garden,
translation.it: e, per arrivarci, dovremmo uscire dal giardino,

translation.en: along the road and across the Gigant highway,
translation.it: attraversare la strada e l'autostrada dei Giganti,

translation.en: through miles and miles and miles of uncharted forest,
translation.it: percorrere chilometri e chilometri di bosco inesplorato,

translation.en: across an even bigger Gigant highway.
Then through a jungle filled with bug-knows-what,
translation.it: poi un bosco pieno di chissà cosa

translation.en: until we finally arrive
at the Rocket Ship Park.
Which means we have a very long way to travel by tomorrow!
translation.it: Dovremmo percorrere un sacco di chilometri entro domani!

translation.en: So, it'll be a tough trip. I get it.
translation.it: Sarà un viaggio difficile, ho capito.

translation.en: It's not a tough trip. It's totally impossible!
Freda? It can't be.
Please do not cry. Water makes me [stuttering] short circuit!
translation.it: Non piangere. Se mi bagni, vado in corto circuito!

translation.en: [Kumi] It's okay, Walter.
We really wanted to go to the Bug Factor, too.
translation.it: Anche noi avremmo voluto partecipare a Bug Factor.

translation.en: [stuttering] You don't understand. I have to go. I simply must.
translation.it: Voi non capite. Io devo andare. Devo assolutamente.

translation.en: We know you wanna be famous, but--
translation.it: Sappiamo che vuoi diventare famoso, ma...

translation.en: But it's too far and too dangerous.
translation.it: Ma è troppo lontano e troppo pericoloso.

translation.en: We'd have more of a chance of... uh, flying to the stars.
translation.it: Avremmo più possibilità di raggiungere le stelle.

translation.en: It can't be.
[chuckles] Isn't she from the Bug Factor?
translation.it: Non è quella di Bug Factor?

translation.en: -Uh, yes, Buzz, she is. -She looks exactly like you!
translation.it: - Proprio così, Buzz. - È identica a te!

translation.en: [laughs] Well, I don't think she's quite got my bone structure,
translation.it: Beh, non ha proprio la mia struttura ossea,

translation.en: but yeah, yes.
[sighs] She's... my sister. My twin sister, Buzz.
translation.it: È mia sorella. La mia gemella, Buzz.

translation.en: -[gasps] You has a sister called Buzz? -Um, no.
translation.it: - Hai una sorella di nome Buzz? - No.

translation.en: Her name is Freda.
Oh! Why'd you never tell us about her?
translation.it: Perché non ci hai mai parlato di lei?

translation.en: I wanted to, but I felt so terry-belly...
translation.it: Avrei voluto, ma mi sento panciosamente in colpa

translation.en: guilty about what happened.
[Walter] When we were little, Freda and I did everything together.
translation.it: Da piccoli, io e Freda facevamo tutto insieme.

translation.en: It was like we were joined at the squish.
translation.it: Eravamo praticamente uniti per la bava.

translation.en: [Walter] Oh, my. We had so much fun together.
Until that terry-belly day.
translation.it: Fino a quel giorno panciosamente orribile.

translation.en: [stuttering] I never saw her again.
Not till today in the Bug Factor.
translation.it: Fino a oggi, a Bug Factor.

translation.en: And now I can't get there.
I wonder if she even remembers me.
translation.it: Mi chiedo se anche lei si ricorda di me.

translation.en: [Freda] Wish me luck, dear Walter.
I so need it.
[Queen Bee] Hey! You there!
-Lazy drone, get me a bigger spotlight. -Huh?
I'm the one fans are coming to see, not these no-talent wannabes.
translation.it: I fan vengono per vedere me e non quegli aspiranti senza talento.

translation.en: Oh, uh, sorry, Queen Bee. I'm not a drone. I'm...
translation.it: Scusa, Queen Bee. Ma non sono un'ape, sono...

translation.en: Well, I'm one of the no-talent wannabes. [chuckles]
translation.it: Sono una degli aspiranti senza talento.

translation.en: -Yeah, Freda and the Bug-ettes? -[Bug-ettes] Hey!
translation.it: - Hai presente Freda e le Bug-ettes? - Ehi!

translation.en: Oh, yes. I heard you rehearsing. You're quite good.
translation.it: Sì, vi ho sentite provare. Non siete niente male.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my goodness!
translation.it: Sì, vi ho sentite provare. Non siete niente male. Santa pancia!

translation.en: Thank you so much, Queen Bee.
That means a belly lot coming from someone like--
translation.it: Significa panciosamente molto detto da qualcuno come...

translation.en: Quite good for a slug, I meant.
translation.it: Intendevo niente male per una lumaca.

translation.en: Darling, let me give you some valuable career advice.
translation.it: Tesoro, lascia che ti dia un consiglio per la tua carriera.

translation.en: Don't even dream of getting between me and that winner's trophy.
translation.it: Non pensare neanche di metterti tra me e il trofeo del vincitore.

translation.en: And if you think I'm all buzz and no sting...
translation.it: Se credi che sia tutto ronzio e niente pungiglione,

translation.en: try me.
Just gotta grab a couple things for Mom,
translation.it: Prendiamo un paio di cose alla mamma

translation.en: then we'll head back to the hospital, okay?
translation.it: e poi torniamo in ospedale, d'accordo?

translation.en: Do I have to come, Daddy?
Oh, honey, you know, your little sister's going to be
translation.it: Tesoro, la tua sorellina sarà una persona

translation.en: a very special person in your life.
[Julia] But she just cries all the time.
-And you said that-- -Tell you what.
translation.it: - E tu hai detto... - Facciamo così.

translation.en: Afterwards, we can go to that park you love. The, uh...
translation.it: Dopo andiamo in quel parco che ti piace tanto. Il...

translation.en: [Julia] The Rocket Ship Park! Um, okay!
[squeals] The Rocket Ship Park! That's where the Bug Factor is!
translation.it: Il Rocket Ship Park! Dove si tiene Bug Factor!

translation.en: I know! Oh, my belly-ness! We have to tell the others!
translation.it: Infatti! Santa pancia! Dobbiamo dirlo agli altri!

translation.en: [Dad] Come on, Julia, we gotta get back to the hospital.
translation.it: Forza, Julia. Dobbiamo tornare in ospedale.

translation.en: Waltsie, I don't think we has time!
Oh, my! You're right!
-We'll have to go all by ourselves! -Oh. Oh.
What was that?
Huh? What are they doing?
Emergency! Emergency!
[Julia] Coming.
[panting] That wasn't... so... hard.
[Jay] Walter! Buzz!
Jump down!
[gasps] Oh, my squish! What are you doing? Rescuing you!
translation.it: - Oh, santa bava! Cosa state facendo? - Vi stiamo salvando!

translation.en: Slide down before it's too late!
translation.it: Scivolate giù prima che sia troppo tardi!

translation.en: But we don't want to be rescued!
translation.it: Ma noi non vogliamo essere salvati!

translation.en: Are we sure about that?
Crick, we gotta go faster.
[stutters] But that could cause mechanical failure.
Hey, look. Look over there! [grunts]
Walter and Buzz, I need you to jump down! On the count of three! One...
translation.it: Walter e Buzz, dovete saltare giù! Al tre! Uno...

translation.en: two...
Wait, wait, wait!
Are we going on three or after three, or...
translation.it: Saltiamo al tre, dopo il tre o...

translation.en: -[siren wailing] -Malfunction! Bugs, we have to...
Jump!
This is going so well.
This car is filthy.
Walter, you okay?
I'm good!
Not so good!
-We're in-- -In deep trouble!
Uh, no. We're on our way to the Bug Factor! [laughs]
translation.it: No. Siamo diretti a Bug Factor!

translation.en: [Kumi] What makes you think we're going anywhere near the Bug Factor?
translation.it: Cosa ti fa pensare che arriveremo a Bug Factor?

translation.en: -Huh? -Down here!
Um, well, we heard the Gigants and--
translation.it: Abbiamo sentito i Giganti parlarne e...

translation.en: You realize you almost got us completely squished!
translation.it: Ti rendi conto che per poco non finivamo schiacciati?

translation.en: I mean, that is so unfair!
Now, now... [laughs]
Sounds to me like somebody needs a cuddle-wuddle, hmm?
translation.it: Mi sembra che a qualcuno serva un bell'abbraccio, eh?

translation.en: Who is you?
[chuckling] So, I'm Teddy, Miss Julia's favoritest bear.
translation.it: Sono Teddy, l'orsacchiotto preferito di Julia.

translation.en: My cuddle-wuddles are guaranteed to make you super-duper cheery again.
translation.it: I miei abbracci vi faranno sicuramente tornare felici.

translation.en: Just ask her! I mean, just ask her.
Don't, but you could.
Thanks, but I'm not sure a cuddle-wuddle will help us get home.
translation.it: Grazie, ma dubito che un abbraccio ci aiuterebbe a tornare a casa.

translation.en: Oh, my goodness! We're not going home! We're going to Rocket Ship Park!
translation.it: Santa pancia! Noi non torniamo a casa! Andremo al Rocket Ship Park!

translation.en: Hey, let's turn nasty old frown upside down. [chuckles]
translation.it: Ehi, trasformiamo quel broncio in sorriso.

translation.en: -Bring it in, big guy. -Huh?
And not big in a judging "big."
translation.it: E con ragazzone non intendo dire che sei grasso,

translation.en: -Spirit "big." -[Walter] Hmm!
We has to go to the Bug Factor, so Walter can find Fre--
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare a Bug Factor perché Walter vuole ritrovare Fre...

translation.en: [stutters] Free... free food! [chuckles] Free food. Ooh, I love it.
That's my favorite price, and that's my favorite thing.
translation.it: Ultimamente mi sento un po' accaldato.

translation.en: I hear the catering at Bug Factor is, uh, belly-licious!
translation.it: Pare che nel parco di Bug Factor ci sia un bel freschetto.

translation.en: [whispering] Why don't you tell them?
translation.it: Perché non gli dici la verità?

translation.en: I can't, Buzz. I feel too guilty about what happened.
translation.it: Non posso, Buzz. Mi sento in colpa per ciò che è successo.

translation.en: [chuckling] Still here, little bugs.
Just good cuddle-wuddles going to waste.
Come on. We gotta find a way outta here fast.
translation.it: Avanti. Dobbiamo uscire al più presto di qui.

translation.en: We're here, see? Rocket Ship Park!
translation.it: Siamo arrivati, visto? Siamo al Rocket Ship Park!

translation.en: Uh, I wouldn't be too sure.
translation.it: Io non ne sarei così sicuro.

translation.en: [The Man] Hop out for a minute, Julia, so they can clean the inside.
[Julia] Okay, Daddy.
Last chance for a cuddle-wuddle.
Anyone?
Jaction time! We're out of here.
translation.it: Jaction time! Dobbiamo uscire di qui.

translation.en: -[Buzz] What's that nasty sound? -Whatever it is, I don't like it.
translation.it: - Cos'è questo brutto rumore? - Qualunque cosa sia, non mi piace.

translation.en: [man] Man, blocked again.
I hate to imagine what it's like down there, Buzz.
translation.it: Non voglio pensare a come sia laggiù, Buzz.

translation.en: Uh, Bugs, we're about to find out!
Bugs, we've got to stay together!
Everyone, hold...
Hold...
Hold hands!
Jaction time! Bugs, come on!
Crick, which way?
Uh, the garden should be... this way!
translation.it: Il giardino dovrebbe essere di qua!

translation.en: Then the Bug Factor is this way!
translation.it: Allora Bug Factor è di là!

translation.en: The Beat Bugs always stick together!
translation.it: I Beat Bugs restano sempre uniti!

translation.en: Oh, my squish! Too late!
[ants] One, two! Two, two!
That's it for rehearsals, bugs.
See you back here tomorrow for the finals, and may the most amazing bug win.
translation.it: Vi aspettiamo domani per la finale, e che vinca l'insetto migliore.

translation.en: Oh, stop!
Oh, Freda, I was just inviting your charming band
translation.it: Freda, stavo giusto invitando la tua incantevole band

translation.en: -back to my suite for some refreshments. -[Bug-ettes cheer]
translation.it: nella mia suite per gustare degli stuzzichini.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, that's terry-belly nice of you, Queen Bee.
translation.it: È panciosamente gentile da parte tua, Queen Bee.

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry, but I just don't have the space for a slug.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma non c'è spazio per una lumaca.

translation.en: Come on, Bug-ettes. Who wants to try my finest honey?
translation.it: Andiamo, Bug-ettes. Chi vuole provare il mio miele migliore?

translation.en: [laughing] You know they say it's the sweetest.
[Kumi] What is that?
We... We lost the others.
What was Walter thinking?
That he wants to be a world-famous bug star?
translation.it: Perché ora vuole diventare a tutti i costi un insetto-star famoso?

translation.en: When is he not thinking that?
No, no. There's something else. Something he's not telling us.
translation.it: Ma c'è dell'altro sotto. Qualcosa che non vuole dirci.

translation.en: Shh. There's something over there.
No. No. No.
[gasps] Yes! [scoffs] No!
[groans] That was--
[splutters] Not awesome!
Jay! Kumi! Cricks!
They're proba-belly miles away.
Don't be sad, Waltsie. Look! The pretty stars are coming out.
translation.it: Non essere triste, Waltsie. Guarda! Stanno arrivando delle belle stelline.

translation.en: [gasps] Oh! Oh, my squish!
They're not stars, Buzz. Run!
-Que pasa? -Come on.
Hola! I am Salvador Rat. Welcome to my studio.
translation.it: Hola! Sono Salvador Rat. Benvenuti nel mio studio.

translation.en: -[all] Huh? -Your studio?
Sí! I am an artist, of course.
I call this Plástico Dramático!
And this is Metálico Fantástico!
And this... this...
is Loopy Poopy!
They're all very interesting, Mr. Salvador,
translation.it: Sono tutte opere interessanti, sig. Salvador,

translation.en: but we're looking for our friends. A slug--
translation.it: ma stiamo cercando i nostri amici. Una lumaca...

translation.en: And a bug?
Uh, sorry. No slug and bug here.
translation.it: Mi dispiace. Non ci sono lumache e insetti, qui.

translation.en: We gotta find them.
They'll never make it home without us.
Who knows where that drain spat them out?
translation.it: Chissà dove li ha portati la fogna?

translation.en: If only there was a way we could send them a...
a signal.
-Mr. Salvador, what do you call these? -[mumbling and chuckling]
translation.it: Sig. Salvador, questi come li chiama?

translation.en: [gasps] Ah! It's unfinished! I wait for inspiration. I am...
translation.it: Quell'opera non è finita! Aspetto l'ispirazione. Mi sento...

translation.en: clogged?
You mean blocked?
Sí, sí! I have the artist blockage on this one.
Well, I might have an idea.
[gasps] A collaboration? Excelente!
-I dream of working with a fellow artist. -[grunting]
translation.it: Da tempo volevo lavorare con altri artisti.

translation.en: Trusting rats. That's what we've come to.
translation.it: Ora ci fidiamo dei ratti. Come ci siamo ridotti?

translation.en: Oh, my squishness.
I should never have gotten you into this.
translation.it: Non avrei dovuto coinvolgerti in tutto questo.

translation.en: But we will get back home again. I... I promise.
translation.it: Ma riusciremo a tornare a casa. Te lo prometto.

translation.en: Buzz, I know you're cold and scared and--
translation.it: Buzz, so che hai freddo e paura e...

translation.en: -[bird screeches] -Oh, my!
But you must try to get some sleep.
translation.it: Ma devi cercare di dormire un po'.

translation.en: -More wire and springs. -Hmm.
-Hmm, wire... -[grunts]
-...and springs! -Whoa!
[Crick] Two Crick-adjustments here.
Huh. Okay, I think it's finished.
The maestro is finished! Magnifico!
Great. Let's switch it on.
Sorry, but the machine needs sunlight. To power it, I mean.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma al macchinario serve la luce del sole per funzionare.

translation.en: What?
Sí. The sun go here, then here, then the power goes zap,
translation.it: Sì, da questa angolazione e poi qui, qui...

translation.en: Yeah. Like that's gonna work.
Anyway, we'd better find somewhere warm till morning.
translation.it: Ad ogni modo dobbiamo trovare un posto caldo fino a domattina.

translation.en: Ah. Allow me, my friends.
-Uh, what's this? -To keep you warm.
Aw. But won't you get cold?
I have my birthday suit.
Please. I tuck you in, sí?
translation.it: Lasciate che vi rimbocchi per bene.

translation.en: Oh! Um, thanks, Salvador.
Are we ever gonna get home?
translation.it: Riusciremo mai a tornare a casa?

translation.en: Everyone up. It's here. It's here!
Come on, Mr. Sun.
Oh, my. Buzz, look.
[gasps] Is it them?
They're hearts. It has to be them. Follow those leaves.
translation.it: Sono cuori. Devono essere loro. Seguiamo quelle foglie.

translation.en: We're out of leaves!
I'm sorry, bugs. I tried.
[both gasp] There they are!
I missed you all so much!
translation.it: Mi siete mancati tutti così tanto!

translation.en: We missed you too, Buzz.
[Crick grunting] I... can't... breathe!
Oh, my belly-ness, I...
We should never have left you.
Yeah, so how come you did?
I... I... I don't know what to say.
Waltsie, you has to tell them.
-It's okay, Walter, whatever it is. -Yeah.
translation.it: - Puoi dirci qualunque cosa, Walter. - Sì.

translation.en: Isn't that one of the singers from the Bug Factor?
translation.it: Quella non è una delle concorrenti di Bug Factor?

translation.en: Her name is... Freda.
[stuttering] And she's my twin sister.
translation.it: Ed è la mia sorella gemella.

translation.en: -[all gasp] -Your sister?
[chuckles] His sister! And she's going to be my sister, too!
translation.it: Sua sorella! E presto sarà anche la mia!

translation.en: I lost her a belly long time ago.
She's the whole reason I have to go to the Bug Factor.
translation.it: È per lei che devo andare a Bug Factor.

translation.en: -Well, then we have no choice. -We have to go.
translation.it: - Allora non abbiamo scelta. - Dobbiamo andarci.

translation.en: Awesome! Jaction time!
-[Walter] No! -What?
I've already put you in enough danger. I insist you go home. Home!
translation.it: Vi ho già fatto correre troppi pericoli. Voglio che torniate a casa. A casa!

translation.en: Um, Walter...
even if we wanted to, we have no idea which way home is.
translation.it: anche volendo, non sappiamo dove sia casa nostra.

translation.en: [Salvador] When I am lost,
I find somewhere so high I can see the whole world.
translation.it: cerco un posto molto alto da cui vedere tutto quanto.

translation.en: So, where's the highest point around here, Salvador?
translation.it: Qual è il punto più alto qui intorno, Salvador?

translation.en: Can you see anything, Buzz?
Uh, all I see is junk.
You okay, Buzz?
[chuckles] Look! It's--
It's Mr. Kite!
If only we could fly like him, we'd easi-belly find the way home.
translation.it: Se solo potessimo volare come lui, sarebbe panciosamente facile tornare a casa.

translation.en: Or...
the way to the Bug Factor.
I'm so glad my suit came in handy.
translation.it: Sono felice che il mio abito vi sia utile.

translation.en: Okay, Salvador. Do your, um, thing.
translation.it: Bene, Salvador. Ora tocca a lei.

translation.en: [The Man] Ready to go, honey?
We gotta pick up your mom and baby sis from the hospital.
translation.it: Dobbiamo andare a prendere la mamma e la sorellina.

translation.en: [Julia] Can't we stay a bit longer?
translation.it: Non possiamo restare ancora un po'?

translation.en: Hola! Look at me!
I am a rat. A big scary rat. Oh!
translation.it: Sono un ratto. Un grosso ratto spaventoso.

translation.en: Squeak! Squeak!
[The Man screams] Rat! Julia! Leave us alone!
-You monster! Go, go, go away! -He's not that scary, Daddy.
translation.it: - Brutto mostro! Vattene via! - Non fa così paura, papà.

translation.en: Now, bugs!
Good luck, little artists! Adiós! [laughs]
The Beat Bugs! What an unexpected delight!
translation.it: I Beat Bugs! Che bella sorpresa!

translation.en: Welcome aboard, my favorite passengers.
translation.it: Benvenuti a bordo, miei passeggeri preferiti.

translation.en: We were hoping to get a kite's-eye view and see--
translation.it: Speravamo di poter controllare dall'alto se riuscivamo a vedere...

translation.en: -Rocket Ship Park. -[gasps]
But we'll never make it there!
Not in time for the Bug Factor.
translation.it: Non in tempo per Bug Factor.

translation.en: Oh, it's impossible.
Oh, squish! That's settled, then.
translation.it: Oh, santa bava! Dovrò farmene una ragione.

translation.en: I just have to forget the Bug Factor, Freda, and go home.
translation.it: Dovrò dimenticare Bug Factor, Freda e tornare a casa.

translation.en: This is terrible! [screaming]
Buzz, what are you doing?
Waltsie has to find my sister.
I mean his sister, and I's not letting him give up!
translation.it: Voglio dire, sua sorella. E non lascerò che rinunci al suo sogno!

translation.en: Buzz, you mustn't do that. It could be catastrophic!
translation.it: Buzz, non fare così. Rischiamo una catastrofe!

translation.en: Oopsie.
Help! Mr. Kite! How do we stop?
translation.it: Aiuto! Mister Kite! Come ci si ferma?

translation.en: [stutters] I'm afraid you can't!
Not without someone pulling my string. It's all over, chaps!
translation.it: A meno che qualcuno mi tiri il filo. È finita, amici!

translation.en: We have to pull his string!
Come on, bugs! It's our only chance!
translation.it: Avanti! È la nostra sola possibilità!

translation.en: [Jay] Come on, Walter!
Come on, Walter! All together now!
All right, here I come!
Oh! Slugs are definitely not built to fly!
translation.it: Le lumache non sono nate per volare!

translation.en: Huh. Look, Waltsie. Pocket Chip Park.
translation.it: Guarda, Waltsie. Il Pocket Chip Park.

translation.en: Let's give it up for our very own Bug Factor royalty,
translation.it: E ora un bell'applauso per la regina di Bug Factor:

translation.en: -Queen Bee! -[audience cheering]
And the Bug-ettes!
Hey, where you goin'? Queen Bee is singing.
translation.it: Ehi, dove vai? Queen Bee sta cantando.

translation.en: Yes, with my band.
Oh, my squishness! It's the Bug Factor!
translation.it: Oh, santa bava! Siamo a Bug Factor!

translation.en: This is your captain speaking! Adopt the bug brace position!
translation.it: Parla il capitano! Mettetevi tutti in posizione di sicurezza!

translation.en: What a thrilling turn of events.
We have an out-of-control aircraft
which appears to be heading straight for us!
translation.it: sta per schiantarsi su di noi!

translation.en: Take cover!
Oopsie. [chuckles]
-I think we've squished somebody. -[grunting]
translation.it: Mi sa che abbiamo schiacciato qualcuno.

translation.en: Don't touch me, you flying thugs! Security! Take them away!
translation.it: Non toccatemi, mascalzoni volanti! Sicurezza! Portateli via!

translation.en: -[grunts] -No, no, no. Stop! Stop!
We were invited. We're in the competition.
-Sure are. -It's true.
You? Don't be absurd.
We isn't a-surd! We is the Beat Buggies!
translation.it: Noi non siamo sporchi! Siamo i Beat Buggies!

translation.en: You're the Beat Bugs?
It looks like our final act just arrived.
translation.it: Sembra che gli ultimi concorrenti siano arrivati.

translation.en: How about that for an entrance, folks?
Ex-squish me? Do you know where Freda is?
translation.it: Chiedo scusa... Sa per caso dov'è Freda?

translation.en: [chuckles] Freda? She's on her way home.
Poor darling couldn't handle the competition.
translation.it: La poverina non regge la competizione.

translation.en: Such a pity.
[Walter] Freda, it's me!
[grunts] Oh, my. Now you're imagining you can hear him.
translation.it: Cielo, ora sento anche la sua voce.

translation.en: It's all in your squishy head.
translation.it: È tutto nella tua testa bavosa.

translation.en: Please! Stop! I don't want to faint!
translation.it: Ti prego! Fermati! Non voglio svenire!

translation.en: Walter? Is it...
really you?
I never thought I'd see you again.
translation.it: Non pensavo che ti avrei rivisto.

translation.en: Me, too, Freda.
There's so belly much I want to tell you!
translation.it: Ci sono tantissime cose che vorrei dirti!

translation.en: But right now, I have to get you back to that stage.
translation.it: Ma ora devo riportarti sul palco.

translation.en: [man] Hurry up and play something!
I mean, a song would be nice.
We're gonna have a riot in a minute. You've gotta sing now.
translation.it: Tra poco scoppierà una rivolta. Dovete cantare subito.

translation.en: Uh, but Walter promised he'd be--
I want to introduce you to... [sighs] Unveiling...
[sighs] Come on, Walter, get this right.
Introducing my better half!
translation.it: Vi presento la mia dolce metà!

translation.en: No. My other half! This is...
translation.it: No. Mia sorella gemella! Lei è...

translation.en: [all] Freda!
She looks like a real-life mirror!
I want to introduce my family to...
my family.
Let's hear it for our final contestants, the Beat Bugs!
translation.it: E ora gli ultimi concorrenti, i Beat Bugs!

translation.en: You bugs might need these.
[chuckles] I just wanna say
we've traveled so far, overcome impossi-belly odds,
translation.it: che abbiamo viaggiato a lungo e superato ostacoli panciosamente impossibili,

translation.en: and proved that when we work together, we can do anything. [chuckles]
translation.it: dimostrando che insieme si può ottenere qualunque cosa.

translation.en: Uh, Walter, what are we singing?
Just follow my lead.
[chuckling] We did it! You did it!
translation.it: Ce l'abbiamo fatta! Tu ce l'hai fatta!

translation.en: You two are definitely related.
translation.it: Voi due siete senza dubbio fratelli.

translation.en: Freda, can you be my sister too?
translation.it: Freda, vuoi essere anche mia sorella?

translation.en: [chuckles] I'd be honored, Buzz.
This is it, folks.
The winner of the Bug Factor is...
The Beat Bugs!
It's rigged! Play back the tape.
translation.it: La gara è truccata! Mandate indietro il filmato.

translation.en: It's gotta be! It's rigged, I tell you!
translation.it: Non c'è dubbio! La gara è truccata!

translation.en: And here's your prize. The Bug Factor trophy!
translation.it: Ed ecco il premio. Il trofeo di Bug Factor!

translation.en: [sighs] I don't deserve this.
What are you doing, Walter?
It's the least I can do to make up
translation.it: È il minimo che possa fare per farmi perdonare

translation.en: for letting go of you on that horri-belly day.
translation.it: per averti lasciata andare quel giorno panciosamente brutto.

translation.en: What are you talking about, Walter? I was the one who let you go.
translation.it: Ma che stai dicendo, Walter? Sono stata io a lasciarti.

translation.en: Um, no. I'm sure it was me, Freda.
translation.it: No, sono certo di essere stato io, Freda.

translation.en: Oh, my belly-ness, Walter. I know it was me.
translation.it: Oh, santa pancia, Walter. So bene di essere stata io.

translation.en: -Oh... -Definitely related.
[laughs] Oh, my goodness! Then you don't blame me?
translation.it: Santo cielo! Allora non dai la colpa a me?

translation.en: Never. I just missed you.
translation.it: Non l'ho mai fatto. Mi sei solo mancato.

translation.en: Gigant!
[The Man] Dad! Dad! I found my kite!
Come on, bugs! That's our ride home.
translation.it: Forza! È il nostro passaggio per tornare a casa.

translation.en: I am not letting you go again.
[The Man] Sorry, honey, but with all the baby gear, we can't fit the kite.
translation.it: In auto ci sono le cose della piccola. L'aquilone non ci sta.

translation.en: [Julia] But I can't leave him behind!
Wait! Wait, wait, wait! Wait. I know!
How are my passengers?
All good, Mr. Kite!
[gasps] Jay, have you got the trophy?
Huh? I thought you had it!
[chuckles] I can't belly-lieve you're really here!
translation.it: Non posso credere che tu sia davvero qui!

translation.en: Neither can I, Walter.
[Julia] What's that you've got, little baby?
What a weird little thing!
[chuckles] Hey, little bug!
I think this might be yours?
[chuckles] Home! We're home!
♪ Love is all you need Love is all you need ♪
